blogs.title: Тест на коронавирус на основе CRISPR/Cas выдаст результат за пять минут
blogs.summary: Новый тест на SARS-CoV-2 на основе системы CRISPR/Cas обещает достоверный результат уже за пять минут. При этом он определяет даже десятки копий вирусной РНК в микролитре образца и дает не только количественный, но и качественный ответ. Чтобы добиться тако

news.title: Everything You Need to Know About Coronavirus Testing
news.summary: The state of Ohio has, as of this writing, five confirmed cases of Covid-19, the disease caused by the coronavirus SARS-CoV-2.

news.title: Coronavirus testing shouldn’t be this complicated

news.title: Por que os EUA ainda estão lutando para testar o coronavírus
news.summary: Os EUA relataram seu primeiro caso confirmado de COVID-19 em 21 de janeiro. Oito semanas depois, ainda não há testes suficientes para o vírus disponível para todos que precisam deles.

news.title: The standard coronavirus test, if available, works well—but can new diagnostics help in this pandemic?
news.summary: As the United States races to ramp up testing for the pandemic coronavirus using technology based on the tried-and-true polymerase chain reaction (PCR), alternative approaches are beginning to roll out that could make it easier and quicker for…

news.title: Coronavirus testing shouldn’t be this complicated – Infosurhoy
news.summary: The US reported its first confirmed case of COVID-19 on January 21st. Eight weeks later, there still aren’t enough tests for the virus available for everyone who needs them.

news.title: Why the U.S. coronavirus testing failures were inevitable
news.summary: Leah Craig stepped out of her car and into a nightmare. Days after developing a sore throat, the 29-year-old started coughing uncontrollably, something her asthma only made worse.

news.title: La corsa di CRISPR per testare Sars-CoV2
news.summary: I protocolli ci sono già ma la validazione è in corso e nessuno sa se potranno debuttare sul mercato in tempo per incidere in modo rilevante sul corso dell’attuale pandemia.

news.title: Speed Matters – auch bei SARS-CoV-2
news.summary: ) Noch dominieren PCR-basierte Techniken den Virus-Nachweis. Deutlich fixer ist isothermale Amplifikation und natürlich darf auch CRISPR-Cas nicht fehlen.

news.title: Mammoth’s CRISPR Assay for Asymptomatic COVID-19 Carriers Gains Peer-Reviewed Validation
news.summary: Following news of Mammoth Biosciences ’ CRISPR diagnostic assay to detect SARS-CoV-2, the company talked at length with BioSpace about this new test and its ramifications.
